articles.author: Rebekah Riess, Connor Spielmaker and Travis Caldwell, CNN
articles.title: A dramatic rescue saves more than 30 crewmembers from a sinking ship off Nova Scotia
articles.description: More than 30 crew members were rescued via helicopters and naval vessels after a fire erupted on their ship roughly 130 miles from the Canadian coastline, according to a statement from the US Coast Guard.

articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has brought countries to a standstill. Meanwhile, vaccinations have already started in some countries as cases continue to rise. Follow here for the latest.

India's home-grown Covaxin vaccine is 81% effective against Covid-19, according to early data released Wednesday.

articles.title: With the clock ticking, Georgia lawmakers want the state to end daylight saving time
articles.description: Last week, Georgia's Senate passed a bill 46-7 that would end the state's observance of daylight saving time.

articles.author: Jen Christensen, CNN
articles.title: Two doses of Pfizer and Moderna's Covid-19 vaccine are necessary, officials say, but questions still linger
articles.description:
The United States is holding firm to the strategy to administer two doses of the Moderna and Pfizer/BioNTech Covid-19 vaccines a few weeks apart. Still, the idea of expanding the supply by dispensing only one dose hasn't faded away.  

The Trump administratio…
articles.content: CNN's Lauren Mascarenhas and Maggie Fox contributed to this report.

articles.author: Kay Jones and Ashley Killough, CNN
articles.title: Texas power grid CEO is fired following widespread outages during winter storms
articles.description: Following widespread power outages during a series of winter storms that left many Texas residents in the dark for days, the head of the organization overseeing the state's power grid has been fired.

articles.author: Laura He and Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: Inflation fears rattle Asian stocks yet again
articles.description: Asian stocks are falling Thursday as a bond sell-off continues to rattle markets.

articles.title: Watch SpaceX Mars prototype rocket nail landing, explode on pad
articles.description: SpaceX's Starship prototype, the SN10, successfully landed for the first time during a test flight. Minutes later the rocket exploded on its landing pad.

articles.title: This pharmacy is giving customers choice of vaccine
articles.description: CNN's Gary Tuchman looks at one Missouri pharmacy in a predominately black city about which vaccine, between the Moderna and the single-dose Johnson and Johnson, the residents prefer.

articles.author: Steve Almasy and Anjali Huynh, CNN
articles.title: Tennessee task force recovers 150 missing children
articles.description: A total of 150 missing children ranging in age from 3 to 17 were recovered in January and February during a joint law enforcement operation, authorities in Tennessee said Wednesday.

articles.description: CNN's Erin Burnett and Dr. Anthony Fauci discuss the governors of Texas and Mississippi deciding to ease their coronavirus restrictions, even completely lifting mask mandates, amid the pandemic.

articles.title: Origin of golden Trump statue revealed
articles.description: The golden statue of former President Donald Trump unveiled at CPAC and celebrated by supporters originally came from China, not Mexico as the artist initially said.
